name: Circular Tennis: Multiplayer
description:
Become a Pro Tennis Champion! Play Circular Tennis – fun 4, 3 & 2 Player games! Accept the challenge and enter the circle where the last man standing wins!

Have you ever played a tennis game where 4 players are competing against each other? Surely not. Circular Tennis is not one of those regular free tennis games for kids and adults – it is one of those mini games for 2, 3 or 4 players to play with friends and family.

Imagine no net, no court lines, no referees - just a circle, racquets, and you and your friends in the role of the world's greatest tennis players. Simple mini games like this can be really fun.


HOW TO PLAY

It's easy to play - duck or hit the ball to stay in this mini tennis game. Once the ball starts moving faster, you will find out why this is one of those simple, but really fun multiplayer games to play with your friends.


FEATURES:

► Multiplayer game – play 4, 3 or 2 player games
► Last man standing mode
► Fast gameplay
► Choose from 8 male and 4 female pro tennis players


MULTIPLAYER GAMES ARE MORE FUN

How many really fun multiplayer games do you know of? With 2, 3 and 4 player modes, you can hit the Circular Tennis Court and create a challenge with your buddies. If you like simple, addicting and fun games - this family friendly game for kids and adults will keep you entertained for hours.


Why play fun games alone? DOWNLOAD “Circular Tennis 2 Player Games”, choose a 4, 3 or 2 player mode and choose your rivals for one of many to come multiplayer tennis games for kids and adults. Gather your friends and get that vicious circle of free tennis games running. Rank #1 among your friends, be the last man standing and win that Circular Grand Slam.

Become a Pro Tennis Champion! Play Circular Tennis - fun 4, 3 & 2 Player games!
